amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Animal and Plant Health Inspection Services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment offered en bloc to increase funds (by transfer) in the amount of $18 million for APHIS (Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service) accounts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 197 (Roll no. 364).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Weiner.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 197 (Roll no. 364).
